segmentosSRT.text: Master Fugui is going home. You take him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
- What'd he just say?
- Nothing. Eat.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: It's not good for the baby.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Come, give Mrs. Xu a seat.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
but you've nothing left.
What would you wager?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: If you're unhappy, talk to Mr. Xie.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: I am very sorry, but you've got nothing left.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
What could you stake the bet on?
We don't accept empty bets.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Anyway, your life's worth little now.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Not that we'd accept it as ante.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: and explain to your old man.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: It's valuable. Don't scratch it. Take it slowly.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Careful, slowly. Don't move too fast!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
Your mother's not well.
Go now, for her sake.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: This old home of yours is great.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Warm in winter, cool in summer.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: I've given up the puppet troupe.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
I don't gamble anymore.
Don't want to end up like you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Get it out of my sight then.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
It's just a bunch of puppets.
Get rid of them! This is war!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
- Where'd you get them?
- Off the corpses.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: The wounded who froze to death.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Put it on. We must survive.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Lao Quan, the place is deserted.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
- On one of the wounded.
- It's a killing field.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Big ambition for a little kid.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: So gobble away. Help yourself to sauces.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing, I'll help you stir that up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
Look at all the chili sauce.
Let me see your eyes.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
- Trying to kill him, or what?
- They're just kids.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Kids? Where did he learn that from?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: This hasn't anything to do with us adults.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: We don't know what's going on.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Do you expect me to believe that?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
It's sabotage.
Sabotage to the communal kitchen.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: And sabotage of the Great Leap Forward!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
He backed up,
and his jeep knocked the wall down.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing was sleeping on the other side.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: The District Chief was hurt, too.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: The District Chief is upset, too.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: How can I ever make it up?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: You can't keep them. Burn them!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Red Guards are swarming over the place.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
I just caught them on a ladder,
pulling off roof tiles.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: You're just in time. We've just finished.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
- Don't rush off!
- I'll make you something to eat.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
He painted all the Chairman Maos
in our factory!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Clear a path! Ship sailing through!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: We haven't taken a photo in years.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
What's this about pushing?
Too early for pushing!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: to educate him, to criticize him...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: and to let him witness her giving birth.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
To show him the heirs
of this new, Red world.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Dad! Mom! Has she given birth?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
- How is he?
- They're both fine!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14
